body.title: Use the same WhatsApp number for Signal and Telegram.
body.description: Also supports iMessage, KakaoTalk, LINE, and WeChat.

body.title: <u>#SelaMAT</u> kepada 👁️👄👁️ - Rokaru
body.subtitle: Andrew C, Andrew MT, Stanley
body.description: Untuk memenangkan Juara 1 dalam kompetisi The 2020 Bina Nusantara Hackathon "Fostering and Empowering Indonesia"

body:
H31.10,
WORLD!

Welcome to my new homepage!

It has been a long time since we have met, either from the late days of primary school, or up to the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic.

If you're reading this in a mobile phone or tablet, tap the Menu icon to view all of my projects, events, and contacts.

While you are exploring this website, could it be a great idea for me to promote your works, businesses, and campaigns right on this page? Send me an email, Direct Message or Personal Chat if you're interested.
